description.narrative: The objective of the proposed project is to increase access to electricity services in selected rural areas and the availability of solar energy in Burkina Faso by leveraging private finance.

activity-date.narrative: Actual end date of the activity
Actual end date of the activity
Actual start date of the activity
Planned end date of the activity
Planned start date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA

description.narrative: Total Commitment in Second Quarter of 2021
Total Disbursement in First Quarter of 2022

condition.narrative: FA IDA Schedule 2, Section I.A, 2(a)/FA CTF Schedule 2, Section I.A, 2(a)/GA GIF Schedule 2, Section I.A, 2(a)/GA CTF Annex ArticleII, 2.03, A.2(a): the Recipient shall establish, and maintain throughout the course of the Project implementation, a PMU within theMinistry in charge of energy with mandate, composition and resources acceptable to the Association.

FA IDA Schedule 2, Section I.A, 2(d)/FA CTF Schedule 2, Section I.A, 2(d)/GA GIF Schedule 2, Section I.A, 2(d)/GA CTF Annex ArticleII, 2.03, A.2(d):: Not later than three (3) months after the Effective Date, the internal auditor, referred to in sub-paragraph (c)of this paragraph shall have been recruited and appointed.

FA IDA Schedule 2, Section I.A, 2(e)/FA CTF Schedule 2, Section I.A, 2(e)/GA GIF Schedule 2, Section I.A, 2(e)/GA CTF Annex ArticleII, 2.03, A.2(e): Not later than three (3) months after the Effective Date, the external auditor shall have recruited and appointedon the basis of terms of reference, qualifications, integrity and experience acceptable to the Association.

FA IDA Schedule 2, Section I.A, 2(f)/FA CTF Schedule 2, Section I.A, 2(f)/GA GIF Schedule 2, Section I.A, 2(f)/GA CTF Annex ArticleII, 2.03, A.2(f): Not later than three (3) months after the Effective Date, the Recipient shall have acquired, installed andcustomized a computerized accounting software, satisfactory to the Association.

FA IDA Schedule 2, Section I.A, 3(a)/FA CTF Schedule 2, Section I.A, 3(a)/GA GIF Schedule 2, Section I.A, 3(a)/GA CTF Annex ArticleII, 2.03, A.3(a): No later than three (3) months after the Effective Date, the Recipient shall establish and maintain, at all timesduring the implementation of the Project, a Project steering committee with a mandate, composition and resources satisfactory tothe Association.

FA IDA Schedule 2, Section I.C, 1/FA CTF Schedule 2, Section I.C, 1/GA CTF Annex Article II, 2.03, C.1: To facilitate the carryingout of Part 1 of the Project, the Recipient shall, not later than one (1) month after the Effective Date enter into animplementation agreement with ABER satisfactory to the Association, vesting responsibility in ABER for the technical management ofPart 1 of the Project, and specifying ABER roles and responsibilities ("ABER Project Implementation Agreement").

FA IDA Schedule 2, Section I.C, 2/FA CTF Schedule 2, Section I.C, 2/GA CTF Annex Article II, 2.03, C.2: To facilitate the carryingout of Part 2 of the Project, the Recipient shall, not later than one (1) month after the Effective Date, enter into animplementation agreement with SONABEL satisfactory to the Association, vesting responsibility in SONABEL for the technicalmanagement of Part 2 of the Project, and specifying SONABEL roles and responsibilities ("SONABEL Project ImplementationAgreement").

FA IDA Schedule 2, Section I.C, 3/FA CTF Schedule 2, Section I.C, 3/GA CTF Annex Article II, 2.03, C.3: To facilitate the carryingout of Part 2 of the Project, the Recipient shall ensure that, not later than one (1) month after the Effective Date, SONABEL hasrecruited and appointed a social development specialist on the basis of terms of reference, qualifications, integrity, andexperience acceptable to the Association.

FA IDA Schedule 2, Section I.D, 2/FA CTF Schedule 2, Section I.D, 2/GA GIF Schedule 2, Section I.C, 2/GA CTF Annex Article II,2.03, D: the Recipient shall, and shall cause ABER and SONABEL to, ensure that the Project is implemented in accordance with theEnvironmental and Social Commitment Plan (“ESCP”), in a manner acceptable to the Association. To this end, the Recipient shall, andshall cause ABER and SONABEL to, ensure that: (a) the measures and actions specified in the ESCP are implemented with due diligenceand efficiency, as provided in the ESCP; (b) sufficient funds are available to cover the costs of implementing the ESCP; (c)policies and procedures are maintained, and qualified and experienced staff in adequate numbers are retained to implement the ESCP,as provided in the ESCP; and (d) the ESCP, or any provision thereof, is not amended, repealed, suspended or waived, except as theAssociation shall otherwise agree in writing, as specified in the ESCP, and ensure that the revised ESCP is disclosed promptlythereafter.

FA IDA Schedule 2, Section I.D, 6/FA CTF Schedule 2, Section I.D, 6/GA GIF Schedule 2, Section I.C, 6/GA CTF Annex Article II,2.03, D.5: the Recipient shall establish, publicize, maintain and operate an accessible grievance mechanism, to receive andfacilitate resolution of concerns and grievances of Project-affected people, and take all measures necessary and appropriate toresolve, or facilitate the resolution of, such concerns and grievances, in a manner acceptable to the Association.

FA IDA Schedule 2, Section I.D, 8/FA CTF Schedule 2, Section I.D, 8/GA GIF Schedule 2, Section I.C, 8/GA CTF Annex Article II,2.03, D.8: The Recipient shall, and shall cause ABER and SONABEL to refrain for carrying out any works under the Project until andunless the relevant RAP, as approved by the Association, has been duly disclosed in country and in the Association's website.
